string-array.name: tweet_text
string-array.item: #DVTvalue Make an impact - a positive impact to our customers' success, our team & in our communities - #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Servant leadership - Leadership at DVT is more coaching, than telling people what to do. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Safe to fail – quick to grow and learn. Sometimes we mess up, but we learn fast. We value learning. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Work-life balance - Life is about balance. At DVT we work hard so that we have time for fun. At work and at home. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Own it – do it. We stick to our word. At DVT, when you commit to your team to get stuff done, then you get it done. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Do the right thing. Honesty, respect & integrity towards our colleagues & community, is the right thing to do. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Simplicity - The art of achieving maximum results with minimum effort. We work hard and like to achieve a lot, quickly. #DVTRefresh
